title: verbal abuse
body:
i get people in the rank team say in the 1st min  we going to loose the game then start picking on supp then i see they are feeding like H_e_l_l   mid or  bot 
then the adc getting killed heaps and the she has a goes on about supp is a noob  then  verbal abuse on screen so you sending mgs back and forth and your not really playing the game as you should  ...  do  you go to base  and stop playing  ?

replies.body: Mute and play the game ez
just put them on ignore and worry about your game and how you play mate
